document.full_text: u.s. lenders would have to offer mortgages with at least a 20 percent down payment if they want to repackage the loan to sell to other investors without keeping some of the risk on their books, according to a proposal u.s. bank regulators endorsed on tuesday.
document.title: regulators define "safe" home loan
